content.raw:
hum just speaking with  plane maintener on apm, it should use -1 1 for aileron ... I need to be more carefull, but the logic of offset and multiplier is not and evidence ! 
I will modify that and retest . But with offset 0 and assuming that gazebo get 0 1 (here setting 0 1 https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2450/ardupilot-refactor-and-minor-improvements/diff#Lplugins/ArduPilotPlugin.ccT795) as input, the plane doesn't fly directly on start...

Otherwise using ardupilot plugin for iris also works now : https://bitbucket.org/pkancir/gazebo_models/commits/975d7f0ada9665edde17ba400ca50b174502754b?at=zephyr_demos (dirty but fonctionnal) 

And explaination about offset and multiplier should be need !
content.html:
hum just speaking with plane maintener on apm, it should use -1 1 for aileron ... I need to be more carefull, but the logic of offset and multiplier is not and evidence ! I will modify that and retest . But with offset 0 and assuming that gazebo get 0 1 (here setting 0 1 https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2450/ardupilot-refactor-and-minor-improvements/diff#Lplugins/ArduPilotPlugin.ccT795) as input, the plane doesn't fly directly on start...

Otherwise using ardupilot plugin for iris also works now : https://bitbucket.org/pkancir/gazebo_models/commits/975d7f0ada9665edde17ba400ca50b174502754b?at=zephyr_demos (dirty but fonctionnal)

And explaination about offset and multiplier should be need !
